page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content:
{PAULA AND HER FAMILY
My name is Paula Ann Hettmen.I live in Bishops Nympton. My mum lives in Birmingham with my two sisters and my step dad.I have two sisters and one brother.My brother lives in Germany with my dad.I have five gran-mas and one grandad and one pop.I have had a happy life in the country.I went to Sun Shine School before I came to Bishops Nympton. We do all sorts of subjects.At the moment we are doing about the Domesday Project.We made a map and all sorts of things. I won't be living in Bishops Nympton for long because I am moving back with my mum and sisters and my step dad.My sisters are called Tammy and Kim.Tammy is 7, Kim is 4 and I am 10.
